name: Saragota Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain into wineglass with 2 strawberries, and fill balance with Champagne.

name: Sazerac
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, crush sugar cube in a little water, add bitters and Pernod, then stir with ice.

name: Scoff-law Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain.

name: Scotch Highball
instructions: In a large tumbler, add ice and lemon peel. Serve whisky and fill with soda.

name: Scotch Mist
instructions: Fill glass with shaved ice, pour in scotch, add lemon peel.

name: Scotch-on-the-rocks
instructions: Fill glass with cracked ice, pour in scotch, add lemon peel.

name: "75" Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: "S.G." Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain.

name: Shandy Gaff
instructions: Mix equal parts ginger ale and Bass or pale ale.

name: Sherry Cobbler
instructions: Add ingredients, stir well, decorate with fruits, and float port wine on top.

name: Sherry Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain.

name: Sherry Flip
instructions: Shake well, strain into a wineglass, and grate nutmeg on top.

name: Short Life Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain.

name: Side-Car Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain.

name: Silver Cocktail No. 1
instructions: Shake well and strain.

name: Silver Cocktail No. 2
instructions: Stir well with a bar spoon, strain, and squeeze lemon peel on top.

name: Silver Streak Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Sir Charles Punch
instructions: Stir with ice, decorate with fruits, and serve with a straw.

name: Sir Walter Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain.

name: Six Cylinder Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain.

name: Skiers's Special
instructions: In a pewter mug, add boiling red wine, sugar, a lemon slice spiked with cloves, an orange slice, and a cinnamon stick. Serve hot. Specialty of Sun Valley Lodge, Sun Valley, USA.

name: Skoal Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain.

name: Sloeberry Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain.

name: Snowball Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Soda Cocktail
instructions: Mix sugar and Angostura in a large tumbler. Add ice and squeezed lemon peel. Pour in Schweppe's Lemonade and stir.

name: Some Moth Cocktail
instructions: Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass, and add two pickled silver onions.

name: So So Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain.

name: Soul Kiss
instructions: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Southern Beauty
instructions: Shake well and strain into a medium-sized wineglass. Fill balance with soda.

name: South Side
instructions: Shake well and strain into a medium-sized tumbler. Add syphon.

name: Soyer au Champagne
instructions: In a large tumbler, add ice cream, Maraschino, Curaçao, and Brandy. Fill with Champagne, stir well, and add fruit slices and berries.

name: Spirit of St. Louis Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain into a medium-sized wineglass.

name: Spitfire
instructions: Shake with ice and strain.

name: Stanley Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain.

name: Star Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain.

name: Stinger
instructions: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: St. Marc Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain.

name: Stone Fence
instructions: Add whisky and ice to a large tumbler, then fill with cider.

name: Summer Delight
instructions: Shake with ice, strain into a glass, and fill with soda. Garnish with pineapple.

name: Sunshine Cocktail
instructions: Shake well and strain.

name: Swissess
instructions: Shake well, strain into a wineglass, and add a dash of syphon.
